item.title: Project Closed
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

[quote=“iBunnie, post:86, topic:471894”][quote author=Fails link=topic=589557.msg4184608#msg4184608 date=1355969474]
How about we keep ‘legality’ out of this. Ruby doesn’t have to explain anything to anyone (accept the development team) and not to mention, work hours isn’t relevant to the OP at all.

Ruby, I’ve known you for quite some time. I can’t say we’ve been the best of friends, but I do know you well enough to say you aren’t capable of such idiocy. That’s just my 2cents.

OP: this project’s looking great. I hope you all figure out/fix all the complications you’ve encountered these past few days.
[/quote]
Sure thing, but since i’m willing to drop it you should definitly either read a dictionary or take another grammar class…Just a suggestion…[/quote]
And before you start to insult people about their grammar maybe check yours before you post.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Closed
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:89, topic:471894”]Working 18 hours doesn’t mean I was working solidly on one job. While I was on emergency call for my real job I was working as a personal trainer between call outs. Don’t try and talk about something you know nothing about. And just FYI, I could’ve easily worked 18 hours on turbines, we often combine emergency call with our scheduled hours. I’m on call 24/7 so if I get called out at 2am and start work at 8 then it’s quite normal to pull off a 12 hour shift scheduled at this time of year. It’s normal for anyone who works beside me, especially the guys with kids. It only turns illegal if we don’t take breaks regularly.[/quote]Its not like it was any of his business to begin with. Any update on who did it?

Read full topic

item.title: Project Closed
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Working 18 hours doesn’t mean I was working solidly on one job. While I was on emergency call for my real job I was working as a personal trainer between call outs. Don’t try and talk about something you know nothing about. And just FYI, I could’ve easily worked 18 hours on turbines, we often combine emergency call with our scheduled hours. I’m on call 24/7 so if I get called out at 2am and start work at 8 then it’s quite normal to pull off a 12 hour shift scheduled at this time of year. It’s normal for anyone who works beside me, especially the guys with kids. It only turns illegal if we don’t take breaks regularly.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Closed
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:87, topic:471894”]First off, you’re a loveing idiot. All you do is spam the forum with your useless shit, “nice nice!” You don’t need to reply to each and everyone of extremez’s comments.

Second of all, the only word I misused was ‘accept’ when it should’ve been ‘except.’ Not to mention, when someone ridicules another’s grammar over an online internet forum, it’s just a pathetic attempt to get the last word in.

Third of all. I don’t know where the hell you live, but I never attended a ‘grammar class’, it’s called ‘english’

With this being said, I suggest you stay off this thread since you’re a complete dumb ass and have no clue what you’re talking about.

Sorry for the unneeded comments Extremez.[/quote]
Oh yeah, i’ve got no idea what i’m talking about yet i’m right. x)

Read full topic

item.title: Project Closed
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:83, topic:471894”][quote author=iBunnie link=topic=589557.msg4184553#msg4184553 date=1355964923]

[quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=589557.msg4184538#msg4184538 date=1355963360]

[quote author=iBunnie link=topic=589557.msg4184534#msg4184534 date=1355962928]

[quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=589557.msg4184529#msg4184529 date=1355962511]

Wait wat, I’ve just got in the door after working 18 hours and someones accusing me of redirecting something? Go look at the cpanel logs you fools instead of pointing fingers. Why would I hack a site that I’m working on? Don’t be so idiotic, I’m not a child, I have no reason to attack such a site. If I wanted to damage I sure as fuck wouldn’t have simply redirected it somewhere.
[/quote]I was going to say… I couldn’t think of a reason for you to do something like this. I’m guessing this is associated with the forums being spammed with google topics the other day?
[/quote]I’m pretty sure he didn’t work for 18 hours straight…
[/quote]Not really the point i was trying to get at… Besides he could of how do you know?

Because it’s illegal to make someone/let someone work for 18 hours…
[/quote]https://www.gov.uk/maximum-weekly-working-hours/weekly-maximum-working-hours-and-opting-out
He never said he was forced.[/quote]
They can’t even pay him for working 18 hours unless it’s an unregistered job like farming or something. (Which is what i do but i only work 12 hours a day in the summer, and it also includes dinner)

Read full topic

item.title: Project Closed
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

I can say it wasn’t me, but let’s not point fingers here. It could be anyone on the internet who hacked the website. The password was somewhat weak, maybe someone brute forced their way in? Who knows. All I can recommend is changing all passwords associated to the website, otherwise it can, and will, happen again.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Closed
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:74, topic:471894”]Wait wat, I’ve just got in the door after working 18 hours and someones accusing me of redirecting something? Go look at the cpanel logs you fools instead of pointing fingers. Why would I hack a site that I’m working on? Don’t be so idiotic, I’m not a child, I have no reason to attack such a site. If I wanted to damage I sure as fuck wouldn’t have simply redirected it somewhere.[/quote]Seeing as you, imthenull, and julian (Dondxon on r-s) only had the password the options are limited on who hacked the site. The website was reset and it was redirected to a porn site so I do think someone did some damage. It may not have been you and I’m sorry if it wasn’t you, I just think that julian thinks that it was you.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Closed
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:69, topic:471894”]I have removed the link to your website, so please don’t add it again until you sort your website out.[/quote]I am very sorry about that guys. We think it was hacked by either ruby or imthenull on mopar and was redirected to lemonparty.com. I was told this by Dondxon our main webveloper on r-s earlier today. I have been busy with finals so I never saw it but it has been reset and fixed and we will make sure it doesn’t happen again. I’m deeply sorry about that. Website has been fixed now the link is still 2006redone.org and I’ll add it back to the main thread soon after we make sure it’s all settled but it should be all good now.

Read full topic
